CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Engineering Department relative to Management Team?
SRP.A: Engineering Department is {above} Management Team in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Human Resources relative to Engineering Department?
SRP.A: Human Resources is {below} Engineering Department in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Management Team relative to Human Resources?
SRP.A: Management Team is {above} Human Resources in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total training hours?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Administrative Support}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total training hours?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Engineering Department}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Engineering Department's maximum Training Hours in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Engineering Department's maximum Training Hours is in {2000}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Management Team's maximum Training Hours in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Management Team's maximum Training Hours is in {1992}.

NC.Q: Between 1991 and 1992, did the total Training Hours experience a larger or smaller change than between 1991 and 1993?
NC.A: The change in total training hours between 1991 and 1992 was {larger} than between 1991 and 1993.

NC.Q: Was the total Training Hours in 1996 higher or lower than in 1997?
NC.A: The total training hours in 1996 was {higher} than in 1997.

NC.Q: Between 1992 and 1996, was the average total Training Hours higher or lower than between 1994 and 1999?
NC.A: The average total training hours between 1992 and 1996 was {higher} than between 1994 and 1999.

NC.Q: Was the total Training Hours in 1993 higher or lower than in 2000?
NC.A: The total training hours in 1993 was {higher} than in 2000.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Engineering Department} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Sales Team and Management Team first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Sales Team and Management Team first exchanged leading positions in {1992}.
